Ensure you park your car or bike without hindrance to others as its on main road. Do take note that price is too high for the quantity they serve. Its a one time try for all around the year.

Although a little on the expensive side, it's one of my favorite ice cream parlors of Bangalore. I've been going to this place from almost ten to fifteen years I think. They've expanded now to make it more spacious. It's open really late and not only serves unique I've cream options but also other food options which are also quite enjoyable. The drive in and eat is the experience I enjoy the most. The staff is courteous even in crowded hours.

I ordered the black currant almond Sunday. Looking at the prices I was expecting the best sundae I had ever had, but it was far from it. Their ice cream has to much air whipped into it. Definitely not worth the exorbitant prices they charge. Add to that the lack of seating and you get one of the worst services for the price you are paying.

Good ice cream and chat options but really expensive. Ambience is good and the staff is helpful. Would recommend visiting if you have money to burn. 
Corner House ice cream is much more affordable. Most expensive item of Corner House is the starting range for Richie rich and with equal quality.
One of the best ice cream parlour in Bangalore. Totally loved it. Elvis Presley is a must try. 100% Recommended. Cheers 🍻

I can't explain, How much I loved this place. I wanted a peaceful Cafe kind of place to sit and work/read for hours together. I searched online and found this place. Trust me it's worth going there. Located in a residential area, it's very quiet peaceful, well maintained. The prices are moderate and the taste of the food is not as usual restaurants as it is a healthier food compared to outside. Worth going if you are looking for a good place in a busy city if B'lore where you can calm down and think about life/read book undisturbed.

Ambiance is good.. Food is okay.. But the rate is too high if we consider the food quality.. Drinking Water is not good at all.. Place is clean...if you are too much concerned about health and hygiene and diet then good place to visit.. Too much waiting time as they make the dishes as and when we order so better to visit when you are all free from work and other stuffs..

Enter barefoot. It's an all organic food cafe.. quaint and nice place with some fabulous juices and food.. there's a yoga room.. also games like carrom and books to read. Nice place to unwind from the hustle bustle of Bangalore. Also few rooms available to stay.

It’s one of the most beautiful oasis of peace and calm in a city that looks less like a garden city but more like a garbage dump with every passing day. 
The food is amazing. The teas are exquisite. The people are warm and friendly and leave you alone should you want to recede within yourself or while you work on your idea or lie back with a book. 
A lot of my start up meetings and even media interviews are held here, just because it’s more fun! And the most fun- Doctor. The big friendly black Labrador. A big hug to the Yogisthan family.
A great place to spend peaceful time. Nice ambience. Place full of yogic vibes.. Good food.. Everything will remind you of healthy living.

I used to eat at the Bay Leaf back in the 80's when I lived in Allentown. It is nice that the Bay Leaf survived the near fall of Allentown. Great prices for food this good esp. at lunch. Menu also changes with what is seasonal. Hidden in plain sight on Hamilton Blvd in downtown Allentown is a great little restaurant worth giving a try. We heard about Bay Leaf from a regular customer who lives in Massachusetts and travels to this area regularly.

My wife and I visited this place as we wanted to try something new. This was our fist visit and probably the last. The food was good, but it is definitely is not worth the money. I paid 25 dollars for a little piece of fish, and few veggies on the plate, my wife got the 28 dollar steak that came with identical veggies and we also got a little plate of rice to share. The staff was friendly but I had to call them as nobody would show any interest, not once did they stop to ask if we needed anything or how our food was. We wanted to get more drinks but nobody offered after our glasses were empty most evening, I wanted to get desert at the end but by the time they came I was just ready for a check, and it was a slow night. Most of the time they spent in the back ding some type of paper work. What killed the whole experience for me was the fact that they left the kitchen door open and I saw them taking someones entree out of a microwave. I could live with spending more money for a small dinner but I at least would expect it to be made fresh not in a microwave.

A gem in Center City Allentown. Very professional wait staff. An American Thai restaurant that has something for everyone. We've been going here for 25 years. Really a great deal for lunch. The snow sea bass entree for dinner is one of the finest dishes you will have anywhere.
Great food and service! Had an awesome veal chop. Highly recommend!
Great food. Nice place to eat, friendly atmosphere. I recommend eating at the Bay Leaf.

For a family dine out its a nice place.
The ambience, the interior sets and the way of serving perfectly justifies the name.
Service was pretty quick when it comes to taste i haven't liked it much.
I don't know was that a off day or what but the taste was really not at all good.
But I'll surely recommend you to go and the check this place out once.

I have been to this place only once and I am super - impressed with it !
The best i have able to locate so close to Forum mall.

Ambiance - I loved the ambiance. The moment you enter this place you are transformed into a village set-up. From the furniture, the dishes , the mats , the walls or the ceilings everything is inspired from village culture.
Taste - The best North-Indian dishes I have ever tasted. Yummy food ! ( No wonder the place is crowded all the time ! )
Service - Decent efficient staff.
Price - Moderate.

It is good place for vegetarian and Jain meal.
Those are looking for only vegetarian restaurant it'll be perfect choice for them. If you visit there with gang you'll enjoy food more not because of company but for sharing food.
There are few place where you'll be welcomed by namaste, it is one of the it.

Nice ambience and very warm welcoming waiters. Food is super tasty, delicious and purely vegetarian with Jain veg options.
There is a wait of 15 minutes to 30 minutes usually here. We can give order during that waiting time, if you are in hurry. Once you are inside, you will be impressed with the food you get.

Nice food with nice ambiance. Really impressed with staff behaviour. They have seen with me one elder person is there so they have arranged table at down stairs only. And about food, quality and taste was really nice. Keep it up guys good going.

Serves north-Indian vegetarian food. One of the healthy food options in Indiranagar. Food is tasty too. Service may take a little bit of time and the price is a bit high but worth the wait and the price.  You also have a nice view of the CMH Road if you sit next to the windows. Great food.

Amazing north indian food available for good rates. Must visit for sure if you are crazy about north indian food. The place has good seating arrangement and the service is fast as well. Pretty quick in serving the dishes as well and pretty fast in taking the orders. However the lift does not work here.
Health hygiene food at a affordable price.

Standard food across all the franchisee. Value for money. The HP combinations are tasty and the phulka real light. 
Recommend the combinations and sweets. Not so much the parathas combination (too oily)
Serves very hygiene and healthy veg food. The taste of the food is good and consistent. Decent pricing for the quantity served. The restaurant is spacious.

Good place to stay. Room was neat and was the washroom. The location is very prime. Many food places and shopping brands are very nearby. There is warm water available in the washroom 24*7. Service is also quite good. There is an oven present in the room, which is helpful.

excellent Stay

Hotel is excellent. Good environment. Behaviour of staff is excellent
Food is excellent. I recommend this hotel. This hotel is also excellent to conduct any official meeting. Conferences. Party etc. Rooms are properly cleaned. Toiletries are good quality also. Location wise it is good. Easily accacedsable through bus. Auto. Nearby metro station. Nearly market.
Great hotel. Good food. The parking is easily accessible they don't give you basic toiletry like toothbrush and all. Bit overall it's good and better than the nearby bloomrooms..

Wonderful Experience
Staff is very polite.
Lovely Ambience and hygienic environment.

Good place to stay especially for business travelers. Decent breakfast. 
Maintenance needs to be improved though. Our room keycard was not available and hence everytime we wanted to go in, we had to ask the reception for someone to open it with the master key.
For the price, a really good stay.

No surprises when you walk into any of the Little Italy's around India.
What I liked about this place was the lavish spread for the lunch buffet on a Sunday. Definitely value for money.
The service was attentive. The kids loved the live counters for pizza and pasta.
As this is located on the busy Indiranagar 100ft road, they have very limited parking.

An upscale restaurant offering only Italian cuisines which has become iconic now with its yummy pizzas and pastas. The ambience is a bit let down and needs lot of improvement. The staff is polite and helpful but the service is a bit slow. The seating and the decor needs improvement. A must try is their wood fired pizza with vodka on it.

Being a vegetarian Italian restaurant I love this place. But one thing I felt is options are not great to keep up the name. I expect some really mix and matches from them to make vegetarian food feel awesome. If they revamp their menu to have some exotic stuff then I believe this is the place.
Nice decent place with very cordial people. Food was tasty. Service was also fast enough (may be due to a working day)

Fresh Italian cuisine. You can try variety of pasta, breads etc both veg and non-veg.It is one of the best place for vegetarian Italian food. These cheese nachos are must try. Also many kinds of pasta, pizza as well as ravioli.Good spread in buffet. Great service and courteous staff. Risotto and falafel are simply amazing and must try. Starters are tasty and served with welcome drink if your choice. Soup and canapes are perfect and the nachos with hot nachos cheese is simply to die for.The management is very good and staff is damn cool guys.

Situated near BDA complex of Banashankari 2nd stage in 1st floor, the place can be located easily. The ambience has nothing special, but the view from the  window is quite nice. Food was oily and average. It would be better to put in a request to use less oil, while placing the order. Quantity is adequate but dessert options are quite less. Service can be improved and staff need to learn Kannada.
Food and ambiance both are not good
Food was spicy. Service was Good. Staff quite courteous.
Food was okay , ambience wasn't good at all, I have visited other areas which has good ambience but this one needs to improve.
Nothing great about the food. Ordinary ambience. They had no water for hand wash or in the rest room which was little embarrassing. I think they should invest in the basic amenities first.
Best computer repair center, door step service provider simply superb.

Good oriented by service engineer.. Quick e
Respond to call and good work. .
Best computer maintainance IT infra in Bangalore.
Nice location and friendly staff!

The place is amazing, cozy and you get all you want in a convincing price. The food just makes you feel at home. The only thing is that no outsiders/friends are allowed but than that the reception and response is instantaneous. It has amazing hosts and are available 24/7 to help if needed. If privacy is something that you are looking for then this is a great place, Also there is an amazing rooftop hotel which serves one of the best malayali foods you can get in Koramangala.TOTALLY RECOMMENDED

reviews.author_name: ILuv MyIndia Rana Iconic Fitness Gym
reviews.text: I've stayed at other PG's both new and old even in homes which rented out rooms but nothing compares to the quality, spaciousness, cleanliness, central location and five star service. Staying in Little Home Gents PG is like staying in your very own single or sharing  flat   giving you the best of both worlds all in one; It's the best PG in Koramagala hands down! I Love this place!!! and  I guarantee you will too if you ever visit.👍
Very nice pg for gents. Comfortable and spacious. Rent is also best in the area.

I was here for the food and I loved the food! The lassi was icing on the top! Food is not overpriced at all. The ambience inside is also splendid. Right from the seating to the wall decorations. The entrance is a bit hidden but cute.
Recently renovated.. Place is nice with good food.. And you end up over eating
Expensive taste moderate. And services not good

Great taste for lesser cost. Never been disappointed with the food quality. But the location is pathetic. Small road and situated just behind the railway tracks. People urinate on the road opposite to the restaurant. And that is exactly where we can park the bikes. Otherwise I would have rated another star.

One of the good restaurant I have explored till now. They quiet small menu. But what they have is too tasty. First time I got real taste of Paratha in Bangalore. I will also like to mentioned its very budget friendly with quick service. Its situated little inside of street at corner and on first floor. Easy to drive two wheeler you can get parking. But I wont suggest to drive four wheeler there. Because they do not have proper parking area. At last its an good restaurant with good ambiance and home like tasty food.
